title: Budget balance in Greece 2024
summary: In general Budget balance in billion euros has fallen over the Year.

Budget balance in billion euros is roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, gradually increasing from 2015 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, roughly increasing from 2018 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2021.
The line rapidly decreased by 80.04% from Year 2015 to 2016,increased by 94.9% from Year 2016 to 2017, and lastly, increased by 233.9% from Year 2019 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Budget balance in billion euros, of value 7.27 was reached at Year 2014
Minimum Budget balance in billion euros about 0.59 was reached at Year 2019
